notes: WEALTH exists in every story; meaning and checks are story-owned.
This tutorial demonstrates HP loss, item use, escape logic, and forward progression.
Escaping danger should not automatically end a run unless explicitly chosen.

sections.text:
Moonlight breaks on shattered stone. The ruin’s entrance yawns like a cracked jaw, half-swallowed by ivy and time.

You didn’t come for glory. You came because the road has gone quiet—and because something in the dark has started paying attention.
sections.system: Tutorial: Choices move the story. Consequences change HP, inventory, and flags.

sections.text:
Dust puffs under your boots as you cross the threshold. The corridor ahead is cracked but passable. Your candle flame steadies.

Somewhere deeper, water drips… then stops.

choices.label: Move slowly and watch the floor

sections.text:
You circle the archway and find fresh footprints. Not yours.

You’re not alone.

choices.label: Follow the footprints through a side gap

sections.text:
A wire snaps. A dart bites your shoulder.

Pain flares hot, then cold.

choices.label: Rip it out and push on

sections.text:
You spot the trap in time and step over it.

The ruin feels aware.
You find a hidden cache: herbs and a battered buckler.

The corridor opens into a shattered hall. Broken pillars. A dark pool.

Something scrapes across stone.

You steady your breathing. The pain dulls.

You move on.

The chapel offers a moment of safety. Cold air seeps from behind the altar—downward.

This place does not feel trapped.
sections.system: This room provides safety and forward progression.

choices.label: Examine the reliquary with your candle

sections.text:
A cave-wight slides into view. Pale eyes. Wet skin.

It sniffs the air.

The wight lunges.

This fight is not fair.
You retreat. Something breathes just beyond the light.

The reliquary opens. Inside: a Warden Sigil.

The ruin recognizes you.

The wight moves away toward the pool.

You survive by patience.
Steel bites flesh. You’re hurt, but alive.

You break free and run.

The chapel door and a deeper stair both beckon.

The pool is not water.

It watches.
A sealed black door waits below. It expects a token.

choices.label: Press the Warden Sigil to the door

sections.text:
The ruin accepts you.

You leave alive—and changed.

You escape with your life.

Sometimes survival is the only victory.

Your strength fails.

The ruin waits.

Try again.
